index.title: OENG1191 Building Information Modelling Resource Hub
index.content:
Welcome to all students who have chosen OENG1191! This website is designed to provide you with all the essential information you need. We hope you find it helpful and informative as you embark on your academic journey. Enjoy exploring the resources and opportunities that await you here!
Hardware Requirements
To successfully complete OENG1191, you will need a Windows laptop. The course utilises numerous industry-specific software applications, many of which are only compatible with Windows and cannot be installed on the desktop computers provided by the uni. Consequently, completing assignments with a Mac or school devices is not feasible. Additionally, having only a Windows desktop computer may pose challenges during group assignments. If you do not have access to a Windows laptop, it is recommended that you consider withdrawing from this course.
Software Requirements
Please ensure that you have the following software installed before the course begins:

Autodesk Revit
